EmailTemplate.name: Examiner experience
EmailTemplate.subject: Examiner experience
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for accepting [SUPERVISOR]'s invitation to examine [STUDENT]'s PhD thesis entitled, "[THESIS TITLE]".
Before we proceed with the examination, can you kindly confirm that you had previous experience in examining doctoral theses? The Graduate Research Committee require some details on your previous experience, for example the number of doctoral theses reviewed and/or for which universities.
Many thanks for your assistance _______________________ ​ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia T: +61 3 990 53009 W: www.monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: www.monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
We're listening….your feedback helps us improve Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/MonashGraduateEducation
{!Case.Thread_Id}
